alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 9:40PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Chickasaw and northwestern Monroe Counties through 1015 PM CST... At 940 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Trebloc, or near Houston, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Amory, Aberdeen, Houston, Okolona, New Wren, Trebloc, Nettleton, Hatley, Becker, Egypt, Wren, McCondy, Bigbee and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Mississippi.
